channel.title: Project hellz-end - Have a glance please :)
channel.description:
Hi guys and gals,
I have been out of the game for a LONG while. My brother called me up the other day and said " oi bro lets make a private server for RS" I lol'd, but then it got me thinking, I work now and have the money to operate one. the only thing we lack is the knowledge anymore on how to do it lol, I have looked around and alot has changed over the years. I don't know what base we will use or anything I'll leave that for you to decide whats best seeing I don't know anymore, theirs alot more too choose from haha
Basically what i'm putting forward to the community is an offer to help run a server (someone who knows what their doing) Our server hardware is coming to the DC very soon
Specs: Processor: 2xL5420 2.5Ghz (8 Cores) RAM: 24GB Drives: 500GB 5 IPs (Private /29) 4.5TB Bandwidth (fast BW)
I don't see paying for programming private servers as an option, but You do get use of a pretty decent dedicated server for any projects you may wish to test on it, you may use it as your own so long as it doesn't have a large effect on performance, I might depending how good you are at programming the server and running the server pay you some money here and their. You also MUST have skype and a mic, and be older than 18 (changed due to advice, will depend on the person)
The website will be done by myself as well as a forum to go with and anything else we may need.
If anyone out their is interested please send me a PM I'd be more than happy to answer any questions.
Regards,
Milo
Skype: milomakes007

item.title: Project hellz-end - Have a glance please :)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

milomakes:

Their a link or anything to a dev post or any info on froyoscape?

You can contact the owner via skype:

thunderstrike420.

[size=1pt]Owner is me hehe.[/size]

Read full topic

item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Clawz fury:

Heck, there’s even a respected 12 year old on here that can program pretty well and from seeing him would consider him a reliable rsps partner.

Hmm. I wonder who that is? We may never know…

You can do rsps partnership with FroyoScape if you’d life. (blush)

Milo.

item.title: Project hellz-end - Have a glance please :)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

change the name plz im begging you

if you have any questions about anything rsps related I recommend pming:

Team_rocket
AtomicInt
myself of course

the following listed would be happy to help

also, anyone on here over 18 wouldn’t have time for a project like this… There are plenty of reliable people here under 18. Heck, there’s even a respected 12 year old on here that can program pretty well and from seeing him would consider him a reliable rsps partner.

All the best

Read full topic
